page.title: 20 RELIGIOUS BELIEF & WORSHIP
page.content: The town of Northampton has a marked history of non-conformity in religious faith and worship. In past years both the Methodist tradition and the Baptists were very strong. Today there are a wide number of Christian denominations including Roman Catholics Anglicans,Baptists,Methodists,and Presbyterians. Some famous names associated with the development of Christianity in Northampton include Philip Doddridge (1702-1751)who founded the Castle Hill Chapel,John Wesley who made no less than twenty-four visits to Northampton between 1741 and 1790, and William Carey all of whom made a lasting impression on the town.
